benefits.name: Energy Mastery
benefits.description: Choose one of the following damage types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. Spells you cast ignore Resistance to damage of the chosen type. In addition, when you roll damage for a spell you cast that deals damage of that type, you can treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2.

repeatable.restriction: You must choose a different damage type each time for Energy Mastery.
